description:
A member of http://anidb.net/ch35304 [Silvie Gena]`s Faerie Squadron. She is interested in http://anidb.net/perl-bin/Nexx Gilbert and is always looking for a way to get closer to him. During the final battle of the war against Marduk, she is assigned the position of a bridge officer aboard the http://anidb.net/ch49178 [Macross Cannon] captained by http://anidb.net/perl-bin/Nexx Gilbert.
Source: wiki
name: Kujou Saori
